description:
With team athlete Margo Hayes at the helm, you know this is going to be good. With a big main compartment, 16” laptop sleeve and internal organization pockets, you can bring all your essentials, and then some. Add in large water bottle pockets and some daisy-chain webbing, you’ll be wanting to take the Isabella tote hiking.

  • Durable 300D ripstop polyester with a DWR finish means you can worry less about the bag and more on the journey
  • A stealthy zippered front pocket adds versatility and quick access to your most useful items
  • The durable and coated base make it even more resistant to the elements and accidental drags
  • The removable strap coupled with the tote straps allow for a variety of carrying styles, to keep it comfortable on the way to work or that trip abroad
name: The North Face Isabella Tote - Women's
